title: US tech stocks slide after Altman warns on AI future and MIT study casts doubt on the hype
description: Investors’ long-running enthusiasm for artificial intelligence showed signs of faltering on Tuesday as tech stocks tumbled.
content:
Investors’ long-running enthusiasm for artificial intelligence showed signs of faltering late Tuesday and early Wednesday morning as tech stocks tumbled. Nasdaq 100 futures were off 0.2% this morning, premarket.

title: Job losses, bias, and inequality: Artificial intelligence reshaping modern society
description: The finance industry has been among the earliest adopters, using AI in fraud detection, investment advice, risk management, and regulatory compliance. Reinforcement learning models are being tested for portfolio optimization, while deep learning approaches outperform traditional models in predicting systemic risk. At the micro level, AI tools are also influencing trading strategies through sentiment analysis of financial news, blending traditional data with real-time market signals.
content: Artificial intelligence is advancing at an unprecedented pace, altering economies, governance, and cultural life across the globe. A new review argues that AI is now both a powerful driver of innovation and a disruptive force demanding urgent ethical... [6177 chars]

title: Federal government taps Cohere to work on use of AI in public service
description: The federal government has signed an agreement with a Canadian artificial intelligence company to identify areas where AI can enhance public service operations.
content:
The federal government has signed an agreement with a Canadian artificial intelligence company to identify areas where AI can enhance public service operations.
Cohere will look at how its products can improve federal public services, said Sofia Ousl... [1936 chars]

title: Government Cuts Funding To AICTE By 61% In Two Years, Student Scholarships Also Hit: Education Minister In Rajya Sabha
description: The government has also approved Centres of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence in health, sustainable cities, and agriculture with an allocation of Rs 990 crore till 2027-28. Budget 2025-26 further announced a Rs 500 crore AI centre for education.
content: Government funding to the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) has witnessed a steep decline over the past two years, even as the Centre announces several new big-ticket schemes in higher education. Minister of State for Education Dr. Su... [2780 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Award-Winning AI Revolutionizes Recruitment Industry
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: AQR’s ‘Hard to Believe’ Study Spurs Clash Over AI Use for Quants
description: Wall Street quants and leading financial academics are clashing over whether artificial intelligence has upended one of the core principles of systematic investing.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- Wall Street quants and leading financial academics are clashing over whether artificial intelligence has upended one of the core principles of systematic investing.

title: Elon Musk Wants to Give You Money for Nothing
description: Artificial intelligence is the latest justification for supporting the bad idea of ‘universal basic income.’
content: A Journal report last week explained how tech titans, including Tesla’s Elon Musk and OpenAI’s Sam Altman, envision a “massive wealth-redistribution system” to placate worries over technology displacing human work. Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey and ... [4673 chars]

title: Rethinking hiring: AI as a partner in finding the right job and talent
description: By blending human and artificial intelligence, modern recruitment processes are becoming more efficient, data-driven, and inclusive, aiming for thoughtful hiring decisions.
